name: pal-bracket-web
description: Online bracket for the Best Of Podcast About List's First 300 Episodes Competition

scripts.minify-json: jq --version && cat ../data/episodes.json | jq -crM > dist/data/episodes.min.json && cat ../data/structure.json | jq -crM > dist/data/structure.min.json
scripts.minify-css: lightningcss --version && lightningcss --minify --sourcemap --targets ">= 0.25%" -o dist/index.min.css src/index.css && sed -i 's/sourceMappingURL=dist\/index.min.css.map/sourceMappingURL=index.min.css.map/' dist/index.min.css
scripts.copy-files: cp -vr src/{img,favicon.ico} dist && cp -v .gitignore dist && cp -v ../{CNAME,LICENSE.txt} dist
scripts.build: concurrently --names "json,js,html,css,copy" --prefix-colors auto "yarn run minify-json" "yarn run minify-js" "yarn run minify-html" "yarn run minify-css" "yarn run copy-files"
scripts.clean: mkdir -vp dist/img dist/data; echo "[clean] rm -rf dist/*" && rimraf -g dist/**/*.{css,js,json,html,map,ico,jpg} || true
